member.name: T:Cryville.Audio.AudioShareMode
member.summary: The share mode of an audio connection.

member.name: F:Cryville.Audio.AudioShareMode.Shared
member.summary: The device is shared with other connections, at the cost of a higher latency than . The output data is mixed by the audio service.

member.name: F:Cryville.Audio.AudioShareMode.Exclusive
member.summary: The device is exclusive to the current connection, providing a low latency.
member.remarks: To initialize an exclusive connection, the device must allow exclusive mode and must not be being used in either modes at the moment.

member.remarks: Use with object pool is recommended.

member.name: T:Cryville.Audio.Source.SimpleSequencerSource
member.summary: A simple that mixes sequenced audio sources.

remarks.para: To use this class, take the following steps:

list.item: Attach the to an by setting .
Start playback by calling and setting to .

remarks.para: s can be sequenced to the both before and after playback starts. See .
If is set to , the output will become silence.

member.name: M:Cryville.Audio.Source.SimpleSequencerSource.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.
member.param: Max polyphony of the source. Must be greater than 0. See .

member.summary: Whether this audio stream has been disposed.

member.name: P:Cryville.Audio.Source.SimpleSequencerSource.Playing
member.summary: Whether if the current session is playing.
member.remarks: There is a tiny delay before the playback state actually toggles, which is approximately substracted by .

member.name: M:Cryville.Audio.Source.SimpleSequencerSource.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.param: A byte offset relative to the current position.

remarks.para: This stream can only be seeked from the current position, and forward only. Thus, must be non-negative, and must be .
This stream can only be seeked from the current position, and forward only. See .
Although this stream is seekable, setting this property is not supported and throws . This stream can only be seeked from the current position, and forward only. See .

member.summary: The currently playing.

member.name: M:Cryville.Audio.Source.SimpleSequencerSource.NewSession
member.summary: Stops the current session and creates a new to replace it.

member.name: T:Cryville.Audio.Source.SimpleSequencerSession
member.summary: A session for .

member.name: M:Cryville.Audio.Source.SimpleSequencerSession.Sequence(System.Double,Cryville.Audio.AudioStream)
member.summary: Sequences a at the specified .

remarks.para: If is less than the current time, the will be played immediately.
If the number of audio sources currently playing exceeds , the will be discarded.
Audio sources can be sequenced even when the sequencer has been disposed, while it would not have any effect.
